      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(Game game)
        After clicking a game in the games list, the active games view will be displayed. This also pulls an active game to focus on double click
        Parameters:

      • closeOthers

        public void closeOthers()
        Closes all the tabs except for the one that was clicked. Used in conjunction with the tab right click drop-down that allows users to close multiple tabs at once.
